com.nhaarman.listviewanimations

Class BaseAdapterDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, ListViewWrapperSetter, Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimationAdapter

    public abstract class BaseAdapterDecorator
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements android.widget.SectionIndexer, Swappable, ListViewWrapperSetter
    A decorator class that enables decoration of an instance of the BaseAdapter class.

    Classes extending this class can override methods and provide extra functionality before or after calling the super method.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

        public void setListViewWrapper(ListViewWrapper listViewWrapper)
        Alternative to setAbsListView(android.widget.AbsListView). Sets the ListViewWrapper which contains the ListView this adapter will be bound to. Call this method before setting this adapter to the ListView. Also propagates to the decorated BaseAdapter if applicable.
        Specified by:
        setListViewWrapper in interface ListViewWrapperSetter

      • swapItems

        public void swapItems(int positionOne,
             int positionTwo)
        Description copied from interface: Swappable
        Swaps the item on the first adapter position with the item on the second adapter position. Be sure to call BaseAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged() if appropriate when implementing this method.
        Specified by:
        swapItems in interface Swappable
        Parameters:
        positionOne - First adapter position.
        positionTwo - Second adapter position.
